We invite you to join us on our journey as our family comes together in this shared purpose of sustainable stewardship in farming and viticulture. # Founders
### Jim & Myrna Gulick
West Hills is the result of family coming together with a shared vision. We started West Hills with our three daughters, Lisa, Michelle, and Jennifer. Our vision for West Hills is to make wine that brings people together. A wine that we're proud to share with you, and is made to be shared with those you love.
